channel.title: DHT: Data Harmonisation Tool for IATI
channel.description:
At ZZ we've been looking at how to integrate available data services in the IATI realm and how they benefit a usecase we are working on for IOM.
The basics:
For this to happen we created a service that we named DHT (Data Harmonisation Tool). DHT has integrated CoVE and OIPA (+ some custom scripting) into an automated workflow:
- Clean CSV (custom scripting) - Enabling a CSV template as provided by CoVe - To be processed by CoVE - Export IATI XML by CoVE - Auto-import that IATM XML by OIPA - Push converted data to a Transparency Portal - Provide URI with IATI.XML for The Registry
DHT nows allow all of this to be automated without intervention and I have included an overview of that flow. It took us 2 days to get this up and running.
![22|690x434](upload://xM404JeX6DVasng2398TeK3lc0w.png)
This is *not* a public facing service a such and will not become FTTB.
Just wanted to share this with you.
Siem
